programme.title: 鳳凰早班車
programme.desc: 《鳳凰早班車》: 透過鳳凰衛視龐大的報導網絡從國際各個主要通訊社獲得新聞資訊, 在早上率先向觀眾報導國際間最新發生的重大事情。

programme.title: 鳳凰正點播報 0900
programme.desc: 《鳳凰正點播報》: 每天全球各個角落、各個領域最有價值、新鮮熱辣的新聞大事, 《鳳凰正點播報》為你追蹤報導。第一時間為你送上, 第一時間讓你知道最新發展。

programme.title: 大新聞大歷史
programme.desc: 《大新聞大歷史》是新聞式紀錄片, 旨在透過正在發生的新聞, 沿著歷史的脈絡, 全方位探索事件的點、線、面、四維空間和三體世界。由表象勾勒事件輪廓, 還原新聞背後的邏輯。新聞紀錄片去除盤根錯節, 梳理由關鍵點構成的事實框架, 穿越在歷史和現實之間, 進行一場思想驗證。

programme.desc: 《鳳凰正點播報》: 每天全球各個角落、各個領域最有價值、新鮮熱辣的新聞大事, 《鳳凰正點播報》為你追蹤報導。第一時間為你送上, 第一時間讓你知道最新發展。

programme.title: 問答神州
programme.desc: 《問答神州》: 致力採訪兩岸四地的關鍵人物, 與政壇精英進行高端對話。觀眾將可第一時間掌握中國的最新變化和發展, 將眼光投向快速增長的中國經濟、改革轉型中的大時代。

programme.title: 鳳凰午間專列
programme.desc: 《鳳凰午間專列》: 鳳凰中午的強檔新聞節目, 採取泛中華的報道態度, 關注中國內地的新聞, 也關注香港、台灣以及國際的新聞, 視野更廣闊, 話語空間亦突顯其獨特之處。節目簡潔、實事求事、快人一步, 將新聞帶給正在享用午餐的您, 讓您在休息時段毋須讀報而能輕鬆地接收全球最新出爐的新聞資訊。

programme.desc: 《鳳凰財經日報》每日精選當天最矚目的經濟數據, 世界各地的政經新聞, 並廣邀各方專家進行連線點評, 提供獨到精闢的見解。亦會向觀眾提供全方位的新聞視覺, 率先把握時局帶來的機遇。

programme.title: 時事直通車
programme.desc: 《時事直通車》: 節目專門網羅國際重大事件和其他集錦新聞、聚焦大陸、台灣及香港的要聞時事。

programme.title: 總編輯時間
programme.desc: 《總編輯時間》: 鳳凰總編輯重點編選和剖析一天最值得注意的頭條新聞, 解構事情的來龍去脈, 讓觀眾以評論員的眼光看世界, 深度瞭解重點事項。

programme.title: 新聞今日談
programme.desc: 《新聞今日談》: 節目針對當天最熱門時事問題, 在觀眾最關注的時刻即時作出評論, 讓觀眾更洞悉事件的真相。

programme.title: 鳳凰焦點新聞 2300
programme.desc: 《鳳凰焦點新聞》: 聚焦重大時政議題, 重大社會事件和新聞熱點, 原創性挖掘更多時事與背景, 分析梳理新聞的前因後果, 人物命運, 呈現權威觀點。

programme.title: 總編輯時間
programme.desc: 《總編輯時間》: 鳳凰總編輯重點編選和剖析一天最值得注意的頭條新聞, 解構事情的來龍去脈, 讓觀眾以評論員的眼光看世界, 深度瞭解重點事項。

programme.title: 鳳凰洲際快車
programme.desc: 《鳳凰洲際快車》是鳳凰衛視子夜時段的新聞資訊節目, 為您帶來兩岸三地, 以及國際社會的大小新聞、最新動態和局勢發展。

programme.title: 鳳凰正點播報 0100
programme.desc: 《鳳凰正點播報》: 每天全球各個角落、各個領域最有價值、新鮮熱辣的新聞大事, 《鳳凰正點播報》為你追蹤報導。第一時間為你送上, 第一時間讓你知道最新發展。

programme.title: 金石財經
programme.desc: 《金石財經》精確對準匯股走勢, 鎖定最新金融行情, 結算每日熱門財經話題, 即日即時評論各項消息。

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS: Sunday, November 23, 2025 10AM
programme.desc: Fareed Zakaria brings viewers his insights and analysis, and interviews world leaders, artists, scientists, business leaders, global affairs analysts and other cultural observers for the 'Global Public Square.'.

programme.title: African Voices Playmakers: Warrior Women
programme.desc: Larry Madowo meets two trailblazing women redefining strength and resilience. Somali-born boxer Ramla Ali rose from refugee to Olympic athlete and advocate, using her platform to empower women worldwide. In Lagos, Nigerian police officer Juliet Ukah breaks barriers as the first African woman signed to the Professional Fighters League, proving that true warriors fight for more than victory.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa: Nigeria E1 Boat Racing/Developing Nigeria's Waterways; Samer Kassem
programme.desc: In Lagos Nigeria, 17% of the state is composed of waterways and lagoons. But water transportation is highly underutilized, despite poor road infrastructure and traffic congestion. Now, the state actively seeking to develop its waterways network through public ferries and private operators as well as a partnership with the international boat racing franchise E1, with the first African E1 event taki

programme.title: Marketplace Europe: World Travel Market
programme.desc: The World Travel Market unites industry leaders to take on the biggest challenges and trends in global tourism. From AI and sustainability, to customer service and changing traveler demands, we speak to some of the key figures in European travel to find out how our vacations will evolve in the coming years.

programme.title: Intelligent Future: Intellligent Future - Abu Dhabi: City of the Future
programme.desc: The world's smartest cities are built on an audacious blend of creativity, investment and foresight. As Abu Dhabi redesigns itself, we discover how transformative technologies are reshaping the way cities work, move, and sustain themselves. Becky Anderson explores the innovations driving her home's rise on the global Smart City Index,. We go behind the scenes for the launch of the latest version o

programme.title: Inside Africa: ?Inside Africa's 25th Anniversary: Lupita & Angelique at the Met
programme.desc: As part of?Inside Africa's?25th anniversary, we have a sit-down between two of the continent's most celebrated voices: Angelique Kidjo?and Lupita Nyong'o. The setting is The Met's newly reimagined?Arts of Africa?gallery, a powerful space in which to reflect on African creativity, identity, and legacy. Five-time Grammy award winning Kidjo and Oscar-winning actor Nyong'o reflect on their careers and

programme.desc: From Hong Kong, the most important global business and breaking markets news information as it happens.

programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.desc: Anchored by Anna Edwards and Mark Cudmore, a fast-paced show of news and analysis, building towards the drama and excitement of the start of trading across the Continent.

programme.desc: Kick-start the trading day with Francine Lacqua and Tom Mackenzie from London bringing you news that no investor in Europe can afford to miss.
